name: RogueSlide (itch)
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow keys to slide tiles in any direction
  • Space/Enter to select menu items
  • Esc to pause/exit

How to Play:

  • Tiles "attack" other tiles by sliding into them. For example, if you slid into a goblin you would attack it, but if the goblin's tile slid into your tile it would attack you.
  • Sliding into a potion tile increases your power.

Installation:

Java Runtime Environment is required to run the JAR file. You can get JRE for Windows, Mac, and Linux here: https://www.java.com/en/download/
